examples.example: 这个神奇的东西总能带给我意想不到的惊喜和快乐。

translate.english: This magical thing can always bring me unexpected surprises and happiness.

examples.example: 我的朋友送了我一个很特别的东西，让我感到无比温暖。

translate.english: My friend sent me a very special thing, which made me feel extremely warm.

examples.example: 生活中有很多美好的东西值得我们去探索和发现。

translate.english: There are many wonderful things in life worthy of our exploration and discovery.
